text:
Felix Anthony Silla (born January 11, 1937) is a retired Italian-born retired American actor and stuntman. He was known for his role as the costumed character of Cousin Itt" on television's "The Addams Family". He also starred as Ewok in the movie "Return of the Jedi", and had a small roll in the indie movie "Characterz".
Silla was born in Roccacasale, Italy.
